casebody.data:
IN RE: K.N. 110A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 28, 2019

Jeffrey William Gillette, Attorney at Law, Franklin, For Johnson, Michael

Erica M. Hicks, Attorney at Law, For Guilford County DHHS

Mercedes O. Chut, Attorney at Law

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of March 2019 by Respondent (Father) for Extension of Time to Serve Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of March 2019."

Respondent (Father) shall have up to and including the 12th day of April 2019 to serve his/her proposed record.
